She wants to start building the stable before the bitter winter weather kicks in. She is fully aware that without lenders’ support, she will not be able to carry out her plan.

loans.use: To build a stable for her livestock

loans.name: Marbelly Ramona

texts.es: La joven Marbellys de 22 años de edad, se desempeña como docente de primaria desde hace 3 años, su esposo trabaja en la alcaldia como tecnico, es una mujer  trabajadora que le encanta su trabajo como docente de primaria. Solicita su credito, para construir una habitaciòn en la casita de su mamà, pues con el credito anterior logro reparar la cocina y ahora desea acondicionar su propio espacio para ella y su esposo. Su mayor sueño en la vida  es construir su casa propia, seguir estudiando para ser una docente con mucha experiencia y que su familia permanezca unida.
texts.en:
Marbellys is 22, and has been working as a primary teacher for three years. Her husband works as a technician for the municipality.

She is a hard-working woman who loves her job as a primary teacher. 

She is applying for her loan in order to build a room in her mother's small house. With the previous loan, she managed to repair the kitchen, and now she wishes to fit up their own space for her and her husband.

Her greatest dream in life is to build her own house, to continue studying to be a teacher with a great deal of experience, and that her family always stay  together.

loans.use: To build a room.

loans.name: Elgarida

texts.en:
Elgarida is a 50-year-old woman dealing in livestock trade. She borrowed UGX 3,000,000 to buy more bulls for sale. Elgarida has been in that business for the last 10 years and has gained a lot of experience in it.

Elgarida credits her success to her humble beginnings and determination. She says that she started business with only three goats but now, she can sell three bulls on a single market day. Though her earnings are still low, about 30,000 Ugx per week, her business has kept her going and she supplements it with her other sources of income, especially banana sales.

Elgarida says she still faces a challenge of travelling for long distances looking for buyers for her bulls. Though her son helps her out, she has grown old and is no longer strong. She hopes to buy a motorcycle in the near future to aid her movement.

Elgarida still has hope that with financial access, she will be able to achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to buy more bulls for resale

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en: Agnes is a thirty-eight-year-old married woman with seven children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been operating a retail business for three years. With the proceeds from the business she has been able to pay school fees for her children. Her hardship is customers not paying on time, and her personal goal is educating her children. Her business goal is moving her business to a more permanent location. Agnes wants money to buy soap and sugar to sell.

loans.use: to buy soap and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Laylai

texts.en: Laylai is a 21-year-old single lady. She is a university student. Laylai has applied to this loan to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Duaa

texts.en:
Duaa is a 21-year-old single lady.

Duaa makes use of her free time to make different colors of teddy bears and kids toys. She takes the fabric and the needed materials and turns them into toys for sale.

Now she is thinking of expanding the business and opening her own shop for selling them as toys and gifts, so she has applied for this youth loan to buy more material and increase her productivity.

loans.use: to buy more material and increase her productivity

loans.name: Celeste

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 3 filhos todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe enviando dinheiro para ajudar nas despesas de casa.	
Tem um negócio próprio de compra e venda de produtos diversos. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (óleo, farinha, trigo, açúcar e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria.
No futuro espera progredir no seu negócio e na sua profissão, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é desenvolver o seu negócio e se tornar num grande comerciante.
texts.en:
Married with 3 school children, Celeste lives in her own home with her family and supports her mother by sending money for household expenses.  
She has a business buying and selling various basic foods.  With the requested loan, she will buy food products (such as; oil, flour, wheat, sugar etcetera) in order to increase her available inventory of goods.
In the future, she hopes to improve her work and is committed to repaying the loan in order to request further loans from Hluvuku.
Her goals are to grow her business and become a better merchant.

loans.use: to buy and sell food products (such as; oil, flour, wheat, sugar etcetera)

loans.name: Al-Nourin Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Nourin and is made up of  Nour, Namah, Fatima and Azizh. They live in Sana'a, Yemen. They took a loan of 200,000 YER.

Fatima is 51 years old, married and lives in Sana'a, Yemen. She is the second woman from the right in the photo. She is a housewife. The main hardship that she faces  is the lack of money. so, She is requesting a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB to purchase fridge.  She is the leader of the four members and she hopes to offer for her family good life.

loans.use: to purchase fridge for personal use

loans.name: Norn

texts.en: Norn is 38 years old. She is married and resides with three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has worked in a factory in Phnom Penh city since 2004, earning an income of around $2 per day. Her husband is a construction worker, making $2 per day. Each month, she has to spend about $40 on food, around $5 on utilities and $55 on other expenses. Norn is requesting a loan of $500 to purchase a motorbike to go to work. This loan will help her to reduce her transportation costs. In the future, she hopes she can build a new house, open a grocery store and support her children in higher education.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike go to work.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha, 48 years old and a married woman, is the mother of one daughter.

Maha is starting a small business selling perfumes at home, and she has applied for this loan to buy more collections of perfumes based on what her friends and neighbors are asking for.

In the future she wants to open a small perfume and cosmetics shop as an expansion for her business.

loans.use: to buy more collections of perfumes

loans.name: Razan

texts.en:
Razan is a 27-year-old married housewife. She is a mother caring for two children.

Razan is establishing a small beauty salon business at home. She has bought some of the required equipment and there is still more that is missing, so she has applied for this youth loan to get another hairdryer and other tools.

loans.use: to get another hairdryer and other tools

loans.name: Saad

texts.en:
This borrower is from Iraq. He is 45 years old, married and has three children.

Saad has owned a shoe shop since 2004. He sells men’s shoes. He has sufficient experience in this field, a deep understanding of local customers, and knows about their demands. He has a good reputation and he is well known in the surrounding areas.

He is requesting a loan of $2,000 to paint the shop. He is aiming to grow his business and increase his profits so he will be able to provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to paint his shop

loans.name: Aziza

texts.en:
Aziza is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo.

Aziza is a 58-year-old woman. She is married and a mother to five sons and two daughters. She is employed and receives a small salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs and their educational expenses.

For the past five years, Aziza and her family members have been working in agriculture, which has been a profitable project. But they need more support to cover their costs.

Aziza is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to provide a share of the family's costs of purchasing seasonal seedlings and fertilizers. It will allow them to produce a better crop and thus increase their sales and improve the income to live in better conditions.

loans.use: To purchase seedlings and fertilizers

loans.name: Aseel

texts.en:
Aseel is a 32-year-old married woman caring for her two children. They live in a rented house.

To be able to support the family with her husband, Aseel has started a small business selling cosmetic products at home.

She has applied for this loan to add makeup tools and products to what she has now.

loans.use: to add makeup tools and products for selling.

loans.name: Amer

texts.en: Amer, a 42-year-old married man, is a mechanic who has a car repair shop. He wants to add a section to his shop to sell spare parts, and for that he has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to add a section to his car repair shop to spare parts

loans.name: Abdulrahman

texts.en: AbdulRahman is 35 years old and married. He has only one boy so far. Abdularahman owns a small food market in his neighborhood. He has applied for this loan to expand his inventory of food items.

loans.use: expand his inventory of food items

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en: Maryam is a 51-year-old married woman. She has a small clothing sales business at home. She included a few of the items she sells in the photograph. Maryam has applied for this loan to buy more clothing items to sell and thus increase her profit.

loans.use: to buy more clothing items to sell

loans.name: Hiyam

texts.en: Hiyam is a 43-year-old married woman. She has a sewing machine at home. She has applied for this loan to buy some fabric to expand her productivity.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Adnan

texts.en:
Adnan, who appears in the picture, is a 32-year-old man. He is married with no children yet.

For the past five years, Adnan has been raising and selling sheep and sheep products. This has been a profitable project and the only source of income for him, but he also needs more support to cover the family's needs.

Adnan is requesting a 2,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing more sheep. This will increase sales and improve the family's income so they can live in better conditions.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and benefit from selling their products.

loans.name: Dopé

texts.fr: Revendeuse de bijoux et montres dans un marché de la place, madame Dopé est maman d’un enfant  âgé de 1an et demi. Ses produits sont de bonne qualité c’est pour cela elle a de nombreux clients de part et d’autres de la ville de Lomé. Son approvisionnement se fait à Lomé et par moment à Cotonou(BÉNIN). Elle l’exerce l’activité seule. Son souhait est de l'agrandir et devenir grossiste dans la vente de ses produits.
texts.en:
Mrs. Dopé is the mother of an 18-month-old child. She sells jewelry and watches at a local market. She has a substantial customer base spread all over the city of Lomé due to the good quality of her merchandise. She buys her stock in Lomé, sometimes in Cotonou (Benin). She works alone. 

Her goal is to expand her activity and become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and watches for resale.

loans.name: Sakher

texts.en:
Sakher, who is photographed next to his taxi, is a 24-year-old single young man.

For the past four years, Sakher has been driving a taxi, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income for him. 

Sakher is requesting a 1,200 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new engine for the taxi he drives. This will increase the taxi capacity to work extra hours and enable Sakher to take additional internal and external requests,  which will improve his income positively and ensure a better future for him.

loans.use: To purchase a new engine for his taxi

loans.name: Juana Nereyda

texts.es: Juana Nereyda, trabaja como docente  de educaciòn primaria desde hace 11 años en la colonia la Uniòn, según referencias de sus vecinos, compañeros de trabajo es una mujer luchadora con alto espiritu de superaciòn personal y profesional, ama su labor como docente ya que imparte el pan de la enseñanza a niños campesinos de su comunidad.  Solicita su crèdito para invertirlo en pequeña reparaciòn de la cocina la cual se encuentra en mal estado y con el clima se le esta deteriorando aun mas. Su mayor sueño es culminar una habitaciòn con mejores condiciones, que  su linda familia permanezca unida y goze de salud.
texts.en: Juana Nereyda has been working as an elementary school teacher for the past 11 years in the Unión neighborhood.  According to references from neighbors, who are also colleagues at work, Nereyda is a hard-working woman with a strong spirit of personal and professional improvement.  She loves her work as a teacher since she shares the bread of learning with rural children from her community.  She is asking for a loan in order to invest in a small repair to her kitchen, since it is currently in a bad state and with the climate it is deteriorating even more.  Her greatest dream is to finish a room with better conditions so that her sweet family can remain united and enjoy good health.

loans.use: To repair the kitchen

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 38-year-old man. He is married and a father to five sons and two daughters. He is employed and gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past six years, Mohammad has also been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project, but he also needs more support to cover its costs.

Mohammad is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing bulk fodder to feed the sheep he is raising. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

Mohammad is photographed next to sheep he is raising in the herd.

loans.use: to purchase fodder for his sheep.

loans.name: Akuwa

texts.fr: Revendeuse de bijoux et pagnes depuis 1996 au marché, Madame Akuwa est une dame âgée de 49ans. Elle a en charge 02 enfants dont un seul est encore sur les bancs de l’école. Ils sont âgés de 25 et 20ans. Il y a un moment qu’elle fait des opérations financières à WAGES et elle est à son troisième crédit dans notre institution. Les deux derniers ont été payés avec succès. Ce montant qu’elle sollicite lui servira à s’approvisionner en bijoux. Avec les profits, elle veut investir dans l’activité, devenir grossiste de bijoux et de pagnes et permettre à ses enfants de s’épanouir.
texts.en:
Mrs. Akuwa, age 49, has been selling jewelry and pagnes (colorful West-African cloth) at the market since 1996. She supports two children, aged 20 and 25, one of them still in school. 

She has been a member of WAGES for some time, and she is currently seeking a third loan from the micro-finance institution. The first two loans were repaid successfully. 

This new credit will allow her to stock up on jewelry. She plans to use the profits earned to reinvest in her activity, become a wholesaler of jewelry and pagnes, and ensure her children’s well-being.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and pagnes for resale.

loans.name: Medetongnon Marguérite

texts.fr: Agée 54 ans, Médétongnon Marguérite est mariée et mère de deux enfants qui sont déjà à leur propre charge. Elle vend des biscuits depuis quelques années et se ravitaille dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le souci d'élargir son commerce et de satisfaire la demande de ses clients qui augmente de jour en jour, elle a fait recours au financement de Finadev en vue d'accroître son intérêt. Le gain généré lui permettra de subvenir à ses besoins et de payer des médicaments pour ses parents.
texts.en:
Médétongnon Marguérite, age 54, is a married mother of two independent children. She has been selling biscuits for a few years, and she buys her stock at a market of Benin. 

To expand her business and meet the needs of her growing customer base, she turned to Finadev for financial assistance. 

The profits earned will allow her to support herself and to pay for her parents’ medication.

loans.use: to buy 30 cartons of biscuits for resale.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.ru:
Ахмад проживает в городе Дангара. Ему 49 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его жена и дочь занимаются домашним хозяйством. Сын Ахмада учится в ВУЗе, а двое младших учатся в школе. 
Ахмад предоставляет услугу. Он уже три года как развозит пассажиров по городу. Ахмад берет кредит для ремонта небольшой маршрутки марки Тангем, чтобы продолжить свою деятельность.
texts.en: Ahmad lives in the city of Dangara.  He is 49 years old, married and has four children.  His wife and daughter are involved in household work.  Ahmad's son attends a university, and his two youngest sons attend a school.  Ahmad provides a service.  He has been transporting passengers within the city for three years.  Ahmad is requesting this loan to repair his small Tangem taxi in order to continue his business.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Abibatou

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de quatre enfants scolarisés dont l'ainé et le benjamin ont respectivement 17 et 02 ans, Abibatou a une baraque où elle vend des chaussures depuis des années. Elle fait ses approvisionnements au fur et à mesure que son stock diminue dans l'un des marchés de l'extérieur. En vue de renforcer son fonds de roulement et de répondre aux besoins de sa clientèle, Abibatou a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev. Ce financement lui permettra de contribuer à la scolarisation de ses enfants et d'aider son mari à creuser une latrine dans leur maison.
texts.en:
Abibatou is a married mother of four children aged 2 to 17, all in school. She has a stall where she has been selling shoes for several years. She replenishes her stock whenever necessary on one of the foreign markets.

To strengthen her working capital and meet the needs of her customers, she requested and obtained a loan from Finadev. This credit will allow her to support her children’s schooling and to help her husband with their project of building a latrine in their house.

loans.use: to buy 35 pairs of shoes of all qualities.

loans.name: Iveth Del Socorro

texts.es: La sra. Iveth de 41 años de edad, es casada, es pequeña comerciante de productos lacteos. Solicita su 1er credito con afodenic para invertirlos en mejoras de vivienda, especificamente para acondicionar un cuarto de la casa, lo que hara sera instalarle piso y embaldosado, y de esa manera poder ocuparlo y contar con mayor comodidad tanto ella como sus hijos.  Espera poder seguir mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia, pues su mayor sueño es tener una casa bonita para su familia.
texts.en: Iveth, 42 years old, is married and works as a dairy product merchant. She is requesting her first loan with AFODENIC to invest in household improvements, specifically to air condition a room in her house. She will also install flooring and tiles so that she can use it and provide better comfort to both her children and herself. She hopes to continue improving living conditions for her family. Her greatest dream is to have a beautiful home for her family.

loans.use: to air condition a room

loans.name: Silberio Florentin

texts.es: Silberio de 44 años de edad es soltero, no tiene hijos, pequeño agricultor con 30 años de experiencia, pues desde que era niño se ha dedicado a la agricultura, oficio que aprendio de sus padres, solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de sembrar maiz, pero necesita comprar herbicidas para preparar la tierra y que la cosecha sea excelente y poder obtener buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Silberio, 44 years old, is single and does not have children. He is a small farmer with 30 years of experience. Since he was a child, he has worked in agriculture, a skill he learned from his parents. He is requesting his first loan so that he can plant corn, but he needs herbicides to prepare the land so that it will harvest well and earn a good profit.

loans.use: to plant corn

loans.name: Savrukhon

texts.ru:
Саврухон родилась 1953 году в Исфаре. Она живет вместе с мужем. У нее четверо детей. Саврухон занимается торговлей. Она арендует небольшую торговую точку, где занимается торговлей канцелярских товаров. Также Саврухон занимается торговлей газет и журналов. Этим видом деятельности она занимается 25 лет. 
Саврухон просит кредит для приобретения канцелярских товаров (школьных принадлежностей) с целью увеличения ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Savrukhon was born in 1953 in Isfara.  She lives with her husband, and they have four children.  Savrukhon is involved in sales.  She leases a small retail outlet, where she sells office supplies.  She also sells newspapers and magazines.  She has been involved in this business for 25 years.  Savrukhon is requesting this loan to purchase office supplies (school supplies) in order to expand her merchandise selection.

loans.use: to purchase office supplies

loans.name: Jose Ronaldo

texts.es: Jose de 40 años de edad es casado,tiene 2 hijos, el mayor de 17 años y el menor de 9, ambos ayudan con los quehaceres de la casa y estudian, Jose se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 12 años, ademas es pequeño comerciante de granos, los que va a vender a Santo Domingo donde tiene su propia clientela. Solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de sembrar maiz, pero necesita comprar herbicidas para preparar la tierra y que la cosecha sea excelente y poder obtener buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Jose, 40 years old, is married with two children who are 17 and 9 years old. Both of them help with the household chores and also attend school. Jose has worked in the agriculture business for 12 years. In addition, he is a small merchant of grains, which he sells in Santo Domingo where he has his own customers. He is requesting his first loan so that he can plant corn, but he needs to buy herbicides to prepare the land so the harvest goes well and he can earn a good profit.

loans.use: to plant corn

loans.name: Amparo Del Socorro

texts.es: Amparo de 37 años de edad es casada, no tiene hijos, desde que era niña se ha dedicado a la agricultura, oficio que aprendio de sus padres, solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de sembrar maiz, pero necesita comprar herbicidas para preparar la tierra y que la cosecha sea excelente y poder obtener buenas ganancias.  Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo que le apoya con el trabajo.
texts.en: Amparo, 37 years old, is married and has no children. Since she was a child, she has worked in agriculture, a skill she learned from her parents. She is requesting her first loan so that she can plant corn, but she needs to buy herbicides to prepare the land so that the harvest will be abundant and she can earn a good profit. She depends on her husband's help who assists with the work.

loans.use: to plant corn

loans.name: Rasmia

texts.en:
Rasmia is a 53-year-old divorced woman.

Rasmia has an artistic talent in embroidery; she wanted to make it different than the ordinary embroidery business, so she started making it on black fabric that is worn by women as an Arabic font.

Now she has applied to this loan to increase her productivity and buy more threads. She hopes that she can participate in more exhibitions and bazaars.

loans.use: buy more thread

loans.name: Sabira

texts.ru: Сабире 62 года.  Будучи на пенсии, тем не менее Сабира является очень активной и энергичной женщиной - в качестве источника дохода для семьи, Сабира занимается животноводством.  Начатое 35 лет  назад со стартовой суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS)  хозяйство насчитывает на сегодня  дойную корову с приплодом, 10 овцематок, и приносит около 11,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. Также, Сабира обрабатывает 2,30 га земли с картофелем и зерновыми культурами. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Сабира обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 2 дойных коров. Доходы Сабира частично планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства и часть вложить в помощь сыну в постройке дома.
texts.en: Sabira is 62 years old.  Despite being retired, she is a very active and energetic woman.  To provide a source of income for the family, Sabira is involved in animal husbandry.  The business, started 35 years ago with an initial sum of 5,000 som (KGS), today contains a dairy cow with offspring and four ewes, and yields about 11,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and dairy products.  Sabira also works on 2.30 hectares of land, growing potatoes and cereal crops.  In order to further develop her business, Sabira requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy two dairy cows.  She plans to invest the earnings partially into a continued expansion of her business and partially into helping her son to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase two dairy cows

loans.name: Shohzoda

texts.ru: Шохзода жительница района Дж. Руми. Ей 55 лет. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее дети работают в России. Сама Шохзода занимается скотоводством. Она разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности Шохзода занимается три года. Она просит кредит для закупа бычков и коров с целью увеличения поголовья крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Shohzoda is a resident of the J. Rumy district.  She is 55 years old, married and has three children.  Her children work in Russia.  Shohzoda is involved in animal husbandry.  She breeds livestock for future sale.  She has been in this business for three years.  Shohzoda is requesting this loan to buy bulls and cows in order to increase cattle headcount.

loans.use: to buy bulls and cows

loans.name: Santos Abel

texts.es: Santos de 32 años de edad es casado, tiene un niño de 1 año de edad, es pequeño agricultor de su comunidad, aprendio este oficio de su papá desde que era muy niño, solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de sembrar maiz, pero necesita comprar productos quimicos como herbicidas y fertilizantes para preparar la tierra y que la cosecha sea excelente y poder obtener buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Santos is 32 years old and is married. He has one child that is 1 years old. He is a small farmer in his community. He learned this skill from his father when he was very young. 

He is requesting his first loan with the objective of planting corn but needs to buy chemical products like herbicides and fertilizers to prepare the land and so that the harvest is excellent. In this way he will be able to receive good earnings.

loans.use: to plant corn.

loans.name: Hilsa Mirary

texts.es: Hilsa de 24 años de edad es casada, tiene un bebe recien nacido, desde que tenia 14 años se dedica a la agricultura y cuenta con la experiencia que sus padres le enseñaron, solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de sembrar maiz, pero necesita comprar herbicidas para preparar la tierra y que la cosecha sea excelente y poder obtener buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Hilsa, 24 years old, is married and has a newborn baby. Since she was 14 years old, she has worked in agriculture and relies on the experience that she gained from her parents. She is requesting her first loan so she can plant corn, but she needs to buy herbicides to prepare the land so she has an abundant harvest and can earn a good profit.

loans.use: to plant corn

loans.name: Mariano De Jesus

texts.es: Mariano de 44 años de edad es soltero, tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 12 años de edad que estudian y le ayudan con las labores del campo, Mariano se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 8 años ademas es comerciante de granos y verduras, los cuales comercializa en Santo Domingo; solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de sembrar maiz, pero necesita comprar herbicidas para preparar la tierra y que la cosecha sea excelente y poder obtener buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Mariano is a 44-year-old single father of two children aged 10 and 12, who are in school. His children also help him in his farming activities, from which he has made his living for the past 8 years.  He also sells grains and vegetables in Santo Domingo.  He is seeking his first loan so that he can plant corn.  He needs to purchase herbicides to prepare his land so that he will have an excellent harvest and be able to increase his earnings.

loans.use: to plant corn.

loans.name: Arlen Jose

texts.es: Arlen de 30 años de edad es casado, tiene un hijo de 12 años de edad el cual estudia y trabaja junto a su padre en las labores del campo, desde que era niño se ha dedicado a la agricultura, oficio que aprendio de sus padres, solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de sembrar maiz, pero necesita comprar herbicidas para preparar la tierra y que la cosecha sea excelente y poder obtener buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Arlen is a 30-year-old married man.  He has a 12-year-old son who is in school and also helps him in his farming activities.  Arlen has been farming since his childhood, and he learned to farm from his parents.

He is seeking his first loan so that he can plant corn. He needs to purchase herbicides to prepare his land so that he will have an excellent harvest and be able to increase his earnings.

loans.use: to plant corn.

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es: Israel de 27 años de edad es casado, tiene 2 hijos entre 5 y 10 años de edad, los cuales estudian, desde muy pequeño se ha dedicado a la agricultura, ya que sus padres trabajaban asi, solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de sembrar maiz, pero necesita comprar herbicidas para preparar la tierra y que la cosecha sea excelente y poder obtener buenas ganancias.
texts.en: Israel is a 27-year-old married man with two sons aged 5 and 10 who are in school. He has been working on farms since he was very young, working alongside his parents.  He needs to purchase herbicides to prepare his land so that he will have an excellent harvest and be able to increase his earnings.

loans.use: to plant corn.

loans.name: Yorgina Del Socorro

texts.es: Yorgina de 20 años de edad es casada, tiene un bebe de 1 añito de edad, desde pequeña ha trabajado como pequeña agricultora de granos y otros productos que pueda sembrar junto con su marido, productos que venden para obtener ingresos para el sosten familiar, solicita su primer credito con el objetivo de sembrar maiz, pero necesita comprar herbicidas para preparar la tierra y que la cosecha sea excelente y poder obtener buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Yorgina is 20 years old and is married. She has a one year old baby. Since she was little she has worked as a small grain farmer, as well as with other products that she can plant with her husband. She sells these products to receive income to support her family. 

She is requesting her first loan with the objective of planting corn. She needs herbicides to prepare the land and so that the harvest is excellent and to receive good earnings.

loans.use: to plant corn.

loans.name: Tosheka Group

texts.fr: La cliente Kahindo  est entrepreneur,trésorière du groupe Tosheka, âgée de 52 ans, veuve, mère de 9 enfants.  Son mari fut décédé suite à une  maladie inopinée. La cliente  est vendeuse des braises (charbon de bois). Vers les années 2000, elle  commença son business  avec un fonds  reçu de son ami familier sous forme d'une assistance. Plus tard, elle bénéficia de crédit de l’IMF  Hekima pour renforcer son business. Elle installe ses produits au marché. Ce nouveau crédit doit lui servir de s’approvisionner  avec  9 sacs des braises  pour augmenter son stock.  En plus, elle ambitionne acheter une parcelle et construire confortablement pour ses enfants.  La cliente  remercie Hekima pour  ses actions en faveur de pauvres exclus de banque classique.
texts.en:
This client, Kahindo, is an entrepreneur and the treasurer of the group Tosheka. She is 52 years old, a widow, and the mother of nine children. Her husband is deceased following a sudden illness. This client is a retailer of charcoal. Around the year 2000, she started her business using funds from a close friend as a form of assistance. 

Later on, she benefited from a loan from the microfinance institution Hekima to bolster her business. She sets up her goods at the market. This new loan must serve her to stock up on 9 sacks of charcoal to increase her inventory. In addition, her ambition is to buy a plot of land and to build a house with ease for her children. 

This client thanks Hekima for its actions in favor of poor people excluded from traditional banking.

loans.use: to buy 9 sacks of charcoal

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Yanaturo Alto  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Yanaturo Alto se encuentra está formado por 12 mujeres quienes luchan  día a día en sus diferentes actividades económicas las mismas que les permiten solventar los gastos de sus hogares y sacar adelante a sus familias, son personas carismáticas y alegres, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Viven por el sector de Yanturo en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió, su arquitectura se mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, esta bañada por 4 ríos y desde Diciembre de 1999 es Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Miriam, tiene 20 años, vive en unión libre y ha concebido un hijo que tiene apenas un mes de nacido, su esposo se dedica a la venta de muebles, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive es arrendando. 

La Señora. Miriam por el momento se encuentra recuperándose de su parto, está cuidando de su hijo quien está muy pequeño, pero para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar se dedica a la cría y venta de cuyes, pollos y cerdos, se dedica a esta actividad hace 2 años. 

Este es el segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos.
 
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank Yanaturo Alto is made up of twelve women who fight each day in their various jobs. These jobs allow them to cover their household expenses and move their families forward. They are charismatic and happy people, they maintain the culture and traditions of their people. They live in the Yanaturo sector of the city of Cuenca. This city has a cold climate and its architecture is mixed between the colonial and modern styles. It is bathed by four rivers and since December 1999 it has been a Cultural Heritage City of Humanity. 

One of the members of this group is Miriam. She is 20 years old and lives in a common-law marriage. She has one child that is just a month old. Her husband makes a living selling furniture. They do not have their own house because they rent their place. 

Miriam at the moment is recovering from the birth. She is caring for her son who is very small. However, in order to help her husband with the household expenses, she makes a living raising and selling guinea pigs, chicken and pigs. She has done this work for two years. 

This is her second loan that she is making with the communal bank and she is going to invest it in the purchase of chickens. Her goal is to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Jéronime Aline Ablavi

texts.fr: Agée de 43 ans, Jéronime Ablavi est mariée et mère d'un enfant qui travaille déjà. Elle vend à un dépôt où elle vend les produits de la SOBEBRA depuis quelques années et s'approvisionne dans les grands dépôts les plus proches de son fonds de commerce. Jéronime Ablavi a sollicité et a obtenu un micro crédit à Finadev en vue de renforcer son chiffre d'affaire et de maximiser son profit. Ce crédit lui permettra de subvenir à ses besoins et d'avoir accès aux soins médicaux adéquats.
texts.en:
Jéronime Ablavi, aged 43, is married and the mother of one child, who works. She has been selling for a few years at a warehouse, where SOBEBRA products are sold. She gets her supplies from the large warehouses closest to her business. 

Jéronime Ablavi requested and obtained a micro-loan from Finadev with the aim of bolstering her sales and maximizing her profit. This loan will enable her to meet her needs and to have access to adequate medical care.

loans.use: to buy 25 cases of beers, 10 cases of various soft drinks

loans.name: Sammy Cindy

texts.es: Sammy de 23 años de edad, es soltera y se encuentra estudiando la carrera de Derecho en la Universidad Cesar Vallejo. La duración total de la carrera es de 5 años y ella lleva estudiando 2 años desde que inició. Actualmente se encuentra laborando como Teleoperadora para una consultora, generando así ingresos el cual lo destina a pagar sus estudios. Ella está muy inspirada y motivada en terminar su carrera, ya que son sus padres quienes le dan la fuerza para poder salir adelante. Uno de sus mayores desafíos es el poder estudiar y trabajar a la misma vez, es por eso que le pone mucho entusiasmo y dedicación a lo que estudia. Su plan para el futuro es convertirse en una abogada de éxito y convertirse en una profesional independiente. Sammy usó el crédito en el pago de sus estudios, con la finalidad de adelantar sus cuotas y no tenga preocupación con tener que pagar cada fin de mes. Ella agradece a las personas que la ayudan a cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Sammy, 23, is single and studies law at Cesar Vallejo University. The program is 5 years, and she has been enrolled for two. She is currently working as a telephone operator for a consulting company and uses that income to pay her tuition. She is very inspired and motivated to finish her degree, as her parents have supported her efforts to get ahead.  

One of her biggest challenges is studying and working at the same time; therefore, she puts much enthusiasm and dedication into her studies. She plans to become a successful attorney and independent professional. Sammy will use the loan to pay her tuition and fees in advance so that she won't be worried about making monthly payments.

loans.use: to pay her tuition and fees.

loans.name: Mujeres De Chilcatotoras   (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Mujeres de Chilcatotoras está formado por 15 mujeres luchadoras y emprendedoras, viven por la parroquia de Tarqui en Cuenca, lugar de clima frió, sus grandes llanuras nos regalan hermosos paisajes y se puede disfrutar la paz de la naturaleza, su centro parroquial se mezcla entre la arquitectura colonial y moderna. Su gente es amable, gentil y de un corazón cálido, se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y muchos laboran en la ciudad diariamente, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Susana, tiene 28 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 7 y 5 años de edad, su esposo labora como albañil, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.

Doña Susana pasa la mayor de su tiempo al cuidado de sus hijos quienes son aun pequeños, cuando le llaman trabaja como empleada domestica y en casa también cría  gallinas, cuyes y ganado a los que los vende cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica.
 
Este es el tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de  abono para los potreros y alimento para sus animales. 

Su meta es  hacer algunos acabados que le hacen falta a su casa.
texts.en:
The Mujeres de Chilcatotoras communal bank is comprised of 15 hard-working and enterprising women. They live in Tarqui Parish in Cuenca, which experiences cold weather. Its large plains provide beautiful landscapes and allow everyone to enjoy the peace and nature. The parish center is a mixture of colonial and modern architecture. The people are kind, pleasant, and have warm hearts. They make a living in agriculture, livestock breeding, and many people work daily in the city. However, they maintain the culture and traditions of their towns.

One of the members of this group is Susana. She is 28 years old, married, and has two children who are 7 and 5 years old. Her husband works as a builder. The house they live in is on their own property.

Susana spends most of her time taking care of her children who are still young. When needed, she works as a domestic employee and also raises chickens, guinea pigs, and livestock at home. She sells them when she has a financial need.

This is the third loan that she is receiving from the communal bank. She will invest it in buying fertilizer for the pastures and animal feed.

Her goal is to finish some needed projects in her home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and animal feed

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad, seen here in his shop, is married and a father to three sons and one daughter. His wife is a nurse at a local hospital where she earns a low salary, not enough to help cover the family's needs.

For the past five years Mohammad has had a butcher shop, which has been a profitable project but also does not bring in enough income to cover the family's needs and bills.

Mohammad is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing meat to resell to customers and distribute to other butcher shops. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: to resell to customers and distribute to other butcher shops.

loans.name: Tolib

texts.ru: Толиб  добрый и трудолюбивый мужчина. Он женат  имеет одного ребенка.  Толиб день и ночь трудиться что бы улучшить свои условия проживания и дать своему ребенку достойное образование.Он печет лепешки в тандыре(национальная печь). Этим видом деятельности он занимается уже 5 лет.  Его жена помогает делать тесто и с раннего  утра Толиб печет лепешки в тандыре. За этот период он набрал большое количество клиентов, которые покупают у него лепешек  каждый день по 2 тележки.На полученный кредит  он хочет установить новый тандыр и закупить несколько мешков угля.Заранее благодарит за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Tolib is a kind and hardworking man.  He is married and has one child.  Tolib works day and night to improve his living conditions and provide his child with a decent education.  He bakes flatbread in a tandoor (national oven).  He has been involved in this business for five years.  His wife helps him make the dough, and Tolib bakes the flatbread in tandoor starting early in the mornings.  During these years, he attracted a large number of clients, who buy two carts of flatbread from him every day.  Tolib wants to use this loan to install a new tandoor and buy several bags of coal.  He is grateful in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase a new tandoor and coal

loans.name: Noussiratou

texts.fr: Noussiratou vit chez son mari avec quatre enfants scolarisés dont l'aîné a 20 ans et le benjamin a 10 ans. Elle vend des boîtes de conserve et des produits alimentaires depuis des années. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés du Bénin. Dans le but de fructifier son activité et de contribuer à la scolarisation de ses enfants, elle a sollicité et a bénéficié d'un prêt à Finadev. Le prêt lui permettra d'assurer une formation de qualité à ses enfants et de renforcer son activité.
texts.en:
Noussiratou lives at her husband's place and has four children in school. The oldest child is 20 years old, and the youngest is 10. She has been selling canned foods and grocery items for years. She gets her supplies from one of the markets in Benin. 

With the goal of making her business more profitable and to help with her children's schooling costs, she requested and received a loan from Finadev. The loan will enable her to ensure a quality education for her children and to bolster her business.

loans.use: to buy 3 boxes of canned foods, 2 boxes of vegetable oil, and a box of spaghetti

loans.name: Farhan

texts.en:
Farhan is a conservative man who prefers not to have his photo published online. He is married and a father to four sons and three daughters. He works, but all of his sons are employed in jobs earning low incomes, not enough to cover their needs.

Here, then, is his son Mo'men pictured next to the place where he’ll live after his upcoming marriage. Farhan wants to help his son complete the building, so he is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN to help his son cover costs. With the loan Mo’men will install tiles, windows, doors, etc. This will create a better home for Farhan’s son.

loans.use: To finish construction.

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 49-year-old woman. She is married and a mother to four sons. Her husband is employed, but gets a low salary, which is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past 2 years, Amal has had a grocery store. The store has been a profitable project, but needs more support to cover its costs.

Amal is requesting a loan of 2,000 US dollars (USD) from FATEN to help the cover the costs of purchasing needed stock of basic groceries that customers often request, such as rice, sugar, and milk. She will also use part of the loan to purchase a new refrigerator, which she will use for preserving food at her store. This will allow her to expand the scope of her work, improve her business, and increase the family's income.

Amal is photographed in her grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase groceries and a refrigerator.

loans.name: Julia

texts.en:
This is Julia, 57, a resident of Baccor, Cavite, Philippines. Her husband is Eutiquio, and she is a mother to her children.  She, together with her husband, manages their own household while operating the business.

Julia operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries, and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, a PHP-5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 600 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 11,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory and for the maintenance of her sewing machine. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Julia hopes to have a good life and that her business will grow and expand through all her hard work on it. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Gisele Valerie's Group

texts.fr: Gisèle Valerie, la responsable d'un groupe composé de deux membres en caution solidaire, est âgée de 53 ans. Mariée et mère de quatre enfants dont deux vont encore à l'école, Gisèle Valerie a un atelier de couture où elle vend des pagnes depuis années. Expérimentée dans le commerce, elle a sollicité et a obtenu un financement auprès de Finadev en vue de renforcer son stock et d'accroître son revenu additionnel. Le surplus dégagé par son activité lui permettra de payer la scolarité de ses enfants et de creuser un puits dans leur maison. Gisele Valerie se retrouve à gauche de la photo.
texts.en:
Gisèle Valerie is the official of the group, composed of two members mutually guaranteeing one another. Gisèle Valerie is 53 years old, married, and the mother of four children, of whom two are still in school. She has a sewing workshop where she has been selling 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa) for years. 

Experienced in commerce, she requested and obtained financing from Finadev with the goal of bolstering her inventory and increasing her extra income. The surplus earned by her business will enable her to pay for her children's schooling costs and to drill a well for their house. Gisèle Valerie is found at the left in the photo.

loans.use: to buy 3 lengths of VLISCO cloth and 10 lengths of various other types of cloth

loans.name: Abdulrahman

texts.en:
Abdulrahman, pictured here in his shop, is a 30-year-old single young man. For the past four years he has had a barber shop, which is located on a main street where there is good foot traffic. The shop has been a profitable project, but Abdulrahman still needs more income to cover his and the shop's expenses.

Abdulrahman is requesting a 1,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing new barbering equipment, installing shelves and painting his shop. The barbering supplies will up the quality and capacity of Abdulrahman's work and improve the shop's condition.

loans.use: To purchase new equipment and improve the shop's space.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita, a 61-year-old married mother of seven grown children, has a small business in which she breeds and fattens pigs to sell for profit. This enterprise has enabled her to provide a good education to her children. 

Now requesting a loan of P23,000 to buy hog feed and medicines for sustainability, Teresita hopes to raise healthy hogs so she can offer them for sale at higher prices, resulting in greater income stability and business progress.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and medicines for sustainability.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is  55 years old and an entrepreneur from the village of Estefania. She runs a small store selling grocery items to the people in her village. From this kind of business, Evangeline was able to support her children's school needs. She hopes to keep achieving better sales from the business so she can save for emergency purposes. To attain this, she is now asking for an additional capital of PHP 23,000 to buy soft drinks, sugar, milk, coffee, and breads to sell in her store. This will help increase sales capacity.

Someday, Evangeline would like to keep gaining more customers and friends and keep growing as a successful entrepreneur in the retail business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, sugar, milk, coffee, and breads to sell in her store

loans.name: Dieudonné Serges

texts.fr: Serges est un homme celibataire de 27 ans sans enfant. Il a ouvert une alimentation pres de son domicile qu'il gere depuis 4 ans deja. Son petit commerce fonctionne grace à son acceuiel chaleureux et à longue experience dans ce domaine et la clientele qu'il a acquis avec le temps. Sa clientèle devient importante et là, il n'arrive plus à sa satisfaire à cause de la petitesse de son capital qui l'oblige à acheter en détail.Il solicite ce credit pour renforcer son petit fond de commerce pour diversifier sa marchandise (avec de l'eau minerale,cartons de sucres, des friandise,...), et pouvoir augmenter sa marge bénéficiaire. Serges réinvestira une partie de son bénéfice dans l’activité pour couvrir les besoins de son secteur et l'autre partie lui permettra de subvenir à ses besoins quotidiens.
texts.en:
Serges is an unmarried man, 27 years old, who has no children. He opened a grocery store near his home. He has been running it for four years already. His small business works, thanks to his warm welcomes, his long experience in this domain, and the customers he has acquired over time. His customer base is becoming significant, yet he can no longer manage to satisfy the demand because his capital is meager. This compels him to buy retail. 

He is requesting this loan to bolster his capital in order to diversify his merchandise (mineral water, boxes of sugar, candies, …) and to be able to increase his profit margin. 

Serges will reinvest part of his profits in his business to cover his business needs. And the other part of the profits will enable him to meet his day-to-day needs.

loans.use: to bolster his stock of merchandise (boxes of soap, mineral water, sugar...)

loans.name: Nueva Juventud  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Nueva Juventud está está formado por 6 socias quienes viven en diferentes lugares de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad tiene una arquitectura colonial y  moderna, sus paisajes enamoran a sus visitantes, es desde Diciembre de 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, es de clima frió pero el corazón de su gente es muy cálido, son personas amables, gentiles, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos, son mujeres trabajadoras que luchan día a día para sacar adelante a sus hijos y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hogares.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Delia, tiene 50 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos quienes son todos mayores de edad, 3 de sus hijos son casados y viven independientes, dos trabajan y le ayudan económicamente, y otro  está estudiando en un colegio a distancia y también trabaja. Su esposo es comerciante, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en una casa que es propiedad de su hijo.

La Señora. Delia trabaja hace un año como ayudante de costura, aprendió esta labor trabajando, también vende ropa recorriendo la ciudad y en días de ferias, este negocio lo tiene hace 10 años, en su casa cría y vende gallinas, cuyes y conejos.
 
Este es el primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal al cual fue invitada  por su hija, su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra ropa para surtir su mercadería. 

Su meta es tener un local propio para vender su mercadería.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank 'Nueva Juventud (New Youth)' consists of 6 members who live in different places in the city of Cuenca.  The city has colonial and modern architecture and visitors fall in love with its landscapes.  Since December 1999, it has been a Cultural Heritage of Humanity.  The city has cold weather but the heart of its people are very warm.  The people are kind, gentle, and still retain the culture and traditions of their people.  They are working women who struggle every day to raise their children and improve the quality of life in their homes.

One of the members of this group is Delia, who is 50 years old and married with 6 children who are all adults.  Three children are married and live independently, two of them work and help out financially, and another is studying in a remote school and also works. Her husband is a businessman.  She does not have her own house but lives in a house owned by her son.

Delia worked for a year as a fashion assistant, she learned this task through working.  She also sells clothing throughout the city and on the days of fairs.  She has been in this business for 10 years.  At home she raises and sells chickens, guinea pigs and rabbits.
 
This is the first loan she is requesting from the communal bank, to which she was invited by her daughter.  She is going to invest the loan in buying clothes to stock her merchandise.

Delia's goal is to have a separate room to sell her wares.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Celma

texts.en:
This is Celma. She previously borrowed 50,000 PHP which she used to buy meat, rice, vegetables, condiments, seasonings, etc. for her food stall. Her earnings have been a big help in covering the education of her children and the family’s personal, household and business expenses.

Celma would like another 50,000 PHP loan from CCT to buy more stock for her stall. Her profits will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this increase in her income with gladness and thankfulness of heart.

All CCT community clients, of which Celma is one, are organized into fellowship groups of fifteen to thirty members who meet on a weekly basis. There they share stories of their work, repay microfinance loans and draw strength and inspiration from their study of the Word of God.

loans.use: to buy more stock for her stall.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
This is Lydia, 56, a resident of Baccor, Cavite, Philippines. Her husband is Jovencio, and she is a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their own household while operating the business.

Lydia operates a variety store. In the Philippines, a variety store is basically a small convenience store, which retails groceries, toiletries, and beverages piecemeal to the local neighborhood. It is the place to go to buy one sachet of shampoo, PHP-5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg. She earns by getting supplies at wholesale prices and selling by the piece. Her store is located adjacent to her house. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 600 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 15,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy groceries, toiletries, and beverages to expand her product inventory and for the maintenance of her sewing machine. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. 

Lydia hopes that her business will grow and expand through all her hard work on her business. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Clarisse Modukpè Agbéké

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de quatre enfants scolarisés dont le plus âgé a 20 ans et le moins âgé a 08 ans, Clarisse Modukpè fabrique et vend des galettes et de l'huile d'arachide depuis quelques années. Elle fait ses achats l'un des marchés du Bénin et ses clients sont composés des semi grossistes et des détaillants de sa localité. Dans le but d'augmenter son capital et de combler les attentes de ses clients, Clarisse Modoukpè a sollicité et a obtenu un appui financier à Finadev. Cet appui financier lui permettra de participer à la scolarisation de ses enfants et de fournir des soins médicaux adéquats pour ses enfants. Elle envisage aider son mari pour la réhabilitation de leur maison.
texts.en:
Married and the mother of four children in school (the oldest is 20 years old, and the youngest is 8), Clarisse Modukpè has been making and selling galettes and peanut oil for a few years. She makes her purchases from one of the markets in Benin, and her customers are composed of semi-wholesale merchants and retailers from her town. 

With the goal of increasing her capital and fulfilling the expectations of her customers, Clarisse Modukpè requested and obtained financial aid from Finadev. This financial aid will enable her to help cover her children's education costs and to provide medical care for them. She envisions helping her husband in renovating their house.

loans.use: to buy 12 sacks of peanuts

loans.name: Miriam Catalina

texts.es:
La Señora. Miriam es socia del banco comunal Damas Responsables, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió, tiene varios lugares para disfrutar de  paisajes y la naturaleza, es desde 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gente es amable, gentil y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

La Señora. Miriam tiene 35 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido un hijo de 12 años de edad que está estudiando en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo es empleado privado, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.

Doña Miriam pasa la mayor de su tiempo en casa al cuidado de su familia, para aportar a la economía de su hogar se dedica la venta de productos naturales de Omnilife actividad que la desempeña hace 3 años, también cría y vende cerdos y cuyes.ç
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 7 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de ganado para iniciar con este negocio.
 
Su meta es crecer en el negocio de venta de ganado y también seguir creciendo en la venta de productos naturales.
texts.en:
Miriam is a member of the communal bank Damas Responsables.  She lives in the city of Cuenca, which has a cold climate.  There are many places to enjoy the countryside and nature.  Since 1999 it has been a World Heritage Site.  The people are friendly and gentle, and they still maintain the traditions of their villages.

Miriam is 35 years old, is married, and has a 12-year-old son who is studying at a school in the city.  Her husband is privately employed, and they own the house that they live in.  She spends most of her time at home caring for her family.  In order to help with the family expenses, she sells natural products from Omnilife.  She has been doing this for three years, and also raises pigs and guinea pigs.

She has been a member of the communal bank for seven years, and she use the funds from this new loan to purchase livestock so she can get started in this business.  Her goal is to grow this livestock business and also continue to grow her sales of natural products.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras - Chilca Group

texts.es:
Saludos !!!!!!!!, esta oportunidad les presento a Yudy, socia del grupo MUJERES EMPRENDEDORAS - CHILCA, conformado por 10 socias, todas ellas muy emprendedoras, y luchadoras, todas tiene el sueño de darlos una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos, y quieren demostrar también que son independientes y pueden salir adelante con su esfuerzo,Yudi es madre de dos hijos, uno de ellos en edad escolar y el otro es muy pequeñito aún, su esposo viajó al extranjero para poder mandarles dinero, pero como no le alcanzaba Yudy junto un poco de capital y puso una tienda pequeña de abarrotes, ella a sus 28 años de edad ha sufrido mucho criando sola a sus hijos, pero con este negocio esta mejorando sus ingresos, es por eso que ella solicito el préstamo para la compra de mercaderia que venderá en su tienda como es arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite, leche, etc.
Ella sueña en un futuro próximo estar junto a su esposo en su país, y poder educar a sus hijos juntos, es por eso que ella trabaja duro para que esta tienda crezca y incrementen sus ingresos.
Ella nos dice GRACIAS!!! por el apoyo otorgado y por creer en sus sueños.Yudy viste una chompa de color ploma oscura ,muy sonriente y es la primera de derecha de la primera fila
texts.en:
Greetings!  On this occasion I’d like to introduce you to Yudy, a member of the “Mujeres Emprendedoras-Chilca” group that has 10 members.  All of them are very enterprising and hardworking and dream with providing their children with a better quality of life and showing that they are also independent and can get ahead by means of their own efforts.

Yudi is the mother of two children one who is school age and the other who is still too young for school.  Her husband went abroad in order to send them money but because it wasn’t enough Yudy gathered a bit of capital together and opened a small grocery store.  At the age of 28 she’s suffered much raising her children by herself but with this business her income has improved and this is why she’s asked for a loan to buy merchandise to sell in her store like rice, sugar, noodles, oil, milk, etc.  She dreams in the future to be reunited with her husband in her country and to be able to educate their children together which is why she works hard so that the store will grow and income will increase.

She says thank you for the support provided and for believing in her dreams.  Yudy is wearing a dark gray sweater; she has a big smile and is the first one on the right in the front row.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, noodles, oil, milk, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay the laborers who work in cleaning up their crops.

loans.name: Cathérine

texts.fr: Agée de 29 ans, Cathérine vit chez son mari et mère d'un bébé. Elle a un restaurant où elle prépare et vend de diverses nourritures depuis un an. Elle s'approvisionne dans l'un des marchés de la place et s'entretient avec un grand nombre de clients compte tenu du bon emplacement de son restaurant. Dans le but de renforcer son chiffre d'affaire et de satisfaire les besoins de ses clients, Cathèrine a fait recours au financement de Finadev en vue de participer aux charges de la famille et d'épargner. Elle souhaiterait agrandir son restaurant et s'abonner à la source d'eau potable du Bénin.
texts.en:
Cathérine, aged 29, lives at her husband's place and is a mother with a baby. She has a restaurant where she has been making and selling a variety of food for a year. She gets her supplies from one of the local markets and maintains a large number of customers, given that her restaurant has a good location. 

With the goal of bolstering her sales and satisfying her customers, Cathèrine has turned toward Finadev financing with the aim of helping to cover family expenses and saving money. She would like to expand her restaurant and to subscribe to Benin's potable water supply.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, a box of canned tomatoes, a basket of chili peppers, 2 sacks of onions, 25 measures of corn, and 2 sacks of rice

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
This is Leonida. She previously borrowed 9,000 PHP from CCT to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her store’s inventory. She expects a boost in her income as she grows her business. Her earnings have been a big help covering her family’s personal, household and business expenses.

Leonida would like to borrow another 11,000 PHP to buy groceries, toiletries, beverages and other such products to add to her inventory. Leonida feels the more items displayed in her store, the better and the greater income. Her profits from the shop will definitely help her meet her daily needs and educational expenses for her children.

Leonida hopes to grow her business in the coming years and dreams of being able to give her children a good and high-quality education through all of her hard work in her business. She looks forward to this increase in income with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

All CCT community clients, of which Leonida is one, are organized into fellowship groups of fifteen to thirty members who meet on a weekly basis. There they share stories of their work, repay microfinance loans and draw strength and inspiration from their study of the Word of God.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items needed in her store.

loans.name: Véronique Amisha

texts.fr: Véronique est une jeune femme de 24 ans célibataire, mère d'un enfant âgé d'un an. Après sa formation, elle ouvert un salon de coiffure qu'elle gère depuis deux ans déjà. Elle a souvent un problème du a l'absence de produits cosmétiques, mèches, et greffes dans son institut parce qu'elle achète ses produits en détail. Son but étant de satisfaire sa clientèle et de réaliser un grand bénéfice. Elle sollicite un crédit pour pouvoir acheter son matériel en grande quantité celui qui permettra d'atteindre ses objectifs. Le bénéfice tiré de ce crédit l'aidera a satisfaire ses besoins, ceux de son enfant, aussi d'épargner pour accroitre son activité dans le future
texts.en:
Véronique is a young woman, 24 years old, who is a mother of a 1-year-old child. After finishing her training, she opened a hair salon, which she has been running for two years already. She often has problems due to a lack of cosmetics, hair extensions, and weaves at her shop because she purchases these goods retail.

Her goal being to satisfy her customers and to make a large profit, she is requesting a loan to purchase her supplies in large amounts. This will enable her to achieve her objectives. The profit derived from this loan will help her to meet her needs and those of her child, as well as to save money for growing her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products and boxes of hair extensions and weaves

loans.name: Celia María

texts.es:
La Señora. Celia es socia del banco comunal Damas Responsables, vive en la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad es de clima frió, tiene varios lugares para disfruta los paisajes y la naturaleza, es desde 1999 Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad, su gente es amable, gentil y aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos.

Doña Celia tiene 72 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 11 hijos todos son mayores de edad, 6 de ellos son casados y viven independientes, sus 5 hijos solteros trabajan para sus gastos personales. Su esposo pasa en casa ya que es jubilado, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad siendo el fruto del trabajo conyugal.

Doña Celia está muy contenta ya que está recuperándose con éxito de un derrame que ha sufrido, los demás miembros de su familia gozan de muy buena salud.

Nuestra socia se dedica a la cría y venta de animales, realiza esta actividad hace 30 años, también labora en otras actividades las mismas que le permiten mejorar la situación económica de su hogar, este trabajo le ha permitido estar cerca de su familia.  Su crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de animales para su negocio y la ganancia que obtuvo le ayudo mucho ya que tuvo que comprar medicinas para mejorar su estado de salud, por este motivo se atraso un poco en el pago de su crédito anterior. Su nuevo crédito es para comprar cuyes y gallinas. La banca comunal le gusta por la comprensión que recibe de todas las socias.
texts.en:
Celia is a member of the communal bank Damas Responsables. She lives in the city of Cuenca, which has a cold climate. There are many places to enjoy the countryside and nature. Since 1999 it has been a World Heritage Site. The people are friendly and gentle, and they still maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.

Celia is 72 years old, is married, and has eleven adult children, six of whom are married and living independently; her five single children work to support themselves.  Her husband is retired and stays home.  They own their home, which is the fruit of their work together. She is very content since she is successfully recuperating from a fall that she suffered.  The other members of the family enjoy very good health.

She raises and sells animals, and she has been doing this for 30 years.  She also does other kinds of work, which allows her to improve her family's financial situation.  Having her own business has allowed her to stay close to her family.  She used her previous loan to purchase animals for her business, and the profit she obtained was very helpful, as she had to buy medicines to improve her health.  For this reason, she was a little late in repaying her previous loan.  Her new loan is to buy guinea pigs and chickens.  She likes the communal bank because all of the members are very kind and understanding.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his coffee and banana crops.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 35-year-old man. He is married and a father to two sons and one daughter, all of whom are school students.

For the past 8 years, Mohammad has been operating a vehicle repairs workshop. This has been a profitable project and the only source of income to him, but it is not enough to cover the family's cost of living.

Mohammad is requesting a loan of 2,000 US dollars (USD) from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new vehicle repair kit. This will improve Mohammad's work quality and increase demand from his customers to repair their vehicles, which will will increase his income and offer him better living conditions.

Mohammad is photographed in the workshop.

loans.use: To purchase a new vehicle repair kit.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline lives serenely in her small home in Estefania with her spouse and one of her four children. To supplement her husband’s farming income, she sells rice to the people in her village. From the contents of a sack of rice, she usually gets 500 PHP in profit. This income goes toward the family’s meals and school expenses.

Evangeline would like to up her income, which is why she is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan from ASKI to buy additional sacks of rice to sell. If profits are good, Evangeline will buy and sell fruits and vegetables as well. This will help diversify her business and achieve her family’s financial stability someday.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Gs Marcelino I Group

texts.es:
La joven Wendy es una persona muy emprendedora dedicada a su negocio, vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos. En Choluteca en el sur de Honduras. Y tiene más de 5 años de tener este tipo de negocio.
Wendy el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de refrescos, café, azúcar, frijoles, arroz, manteca, carne, lácteos y otros productos de consumo de esta manera incrementar más sus ventas.
Wendy con el préstamo espera mejorar sus ventas y asi atender mejor a sus clientes. Con estos fondos espera que su negocio sea más sólido y rentable.
Los sueños de Wendy es poder y darles a sus hijos una mejor educación y ayudar a su familia.
María se dedica a su negocio de compra y venta de ropa americana desde hace más de 10 años en el mercado de esa zona.
Eufemia se dedica su negocio de compra y venta de tortillas. Desde hace mas de 12 años.
Choluteca, Honduras - Junio del 2012
texts.en:
Young Wendy is a very enterprising woman and dedicated to her business. She lives with her husband and five children in Choluteca, in the south of Honduras. She has been running this type of business for more than five years. 

Wendy will invest this loan in the purchase of soft drinks, coffee, sugar, beans, rice, lard, meats, dairy products, and other consumer goods in order to increase sales. Wendy hopes to increase her sales and better serve her customers with this loan. She hopes that with these funds her business will be more stable and profitable. Wendy dreams of being able to provide a better education for her children, and help her family.

Maria has been buying and selling American clothing for more than 10 years in the local market. Eufemia has been buying and selling tortillas for more than 12 years.

Choluteca, Honduras - June 2012

loans.use: to buy beverages, coffee, sugar, beans, rice, lard, meats, dairy products, and other consumer goods for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and seeds.

loans.name: Laila

texts.en: Laila is 40 years old, married and the mother of seven children. For the last few years, she has made a living by selling vegetables and fruits from a rolling cart. She earns about PHP 300 a day by patiently operating her business. Laila is requesting a loan for PHP 5,000 to expand her business by buying more vegetables, such as eggplants, string beans, squash and bananas, to sell to her customers. She hopes that expanding her business will allow her to better secure her family's future and give her children a good education so they can become professionals. Despite the many hardships she has faced, she is determined to work hard and save for her family's future.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Teresa Maria

texts.es: Teresa de 29 años es madre soltera de 2 niños, debido a esta situación se encontró en la necesidad de tener un trabajo para sostener a su familia, como no podía encontrar trabajo decidió abrir un pequeño bazar en su domicilio. La atención la realiza ella de lunes a domingo todo el día, el negocio ha permitido que pueda pasar tiempo con sus hijos y cuidar de ellos. Ella vive en el sector sur conocido como Isla Trinitaria donde no tiene camino pavimentado por lo que representa un gran problema así como la delincuencia, a pesar de esto continuara con su negocio por mucho tiempo. El préstamo que ella solicita es para la compra de cuadernos, cartulina, plumas, láminas, etc., con lo que tendrá más variedad para ofrecer. Con el tiempo su sueño es poder abrir un local para incrementar su negocio.
texts.en:
Teresa, 29, is a single mother of two children.  Because of this situation she needed to have a job in order to support her children but because she couldn’t find employment she decided to open a small store at home.  

She works all day Monday through Sunday.  The business has allowed her to spend time with her children and care for them.  She lives in the southern sector known as Isla Trinitaria that has unpaved roads which is a great problem; so is crime.  Despite this, she will continue in her business for a long time.  

The loan she’s requesting is to buy notebooks, construction paper, pens, illustrated prints, etc. in order to have a wide variety of products to offer.  In time, her dream is to be able to open a store to increase business.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, construction paper, pens and illustrated prints.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and to pay day laborers to work.

loans.name: Julia Antonia

texts.es: Julia vive en Paraíso de la Flor en el cual hay sectores que cuentan solo con las servicio de luz, su casa es de cemento pero el agua la compra por tanques. Es en su domicilio donde ella tiene un bazar y tienda el cual inicio gracia D-miro, surgió como una idea que poco a poco se fue haciendo realidad gracias a su perseverancia y empeño. El trabajo lo realiza sola todos los días sin horario fijo ya que tiene que atender a su familia. Ella se siente satisfecha de sus logros ya que a salido adelante sola esto también la a ayudado para tener el respeto de su vecinos y amigos que ven en ella un ejemplo a trasmitir. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de productos para su bazar y con ello aumentar sus ventas, espera no tener ninguna dificultad y seguir trabajando sin problemas.
texts.en: Julia lives in the Paraiso del La Flor section of Guayaquil, where some neighborhoods lack utilities other than electricity.  Her house is made of cement, but she has to purchase water in tanks.  She has a store in her house which she started up thanks to D-MIRO.  Once she came up with the idea of this business, she gradually made it into a reality thanks to her perseverance and effort.  She works by herself every day without a fixed schedule, because she also must care for her family.  She feels satisfied with her achievements because she has gotten ahead on her own, and this has helped her to gain the respect of her friends and neighbors who see in her an example to pass on to others.  She is requesting a loan to purchase products for her store so that she can increase her sales.  She expects to do this without any difficulties, and to continue working without any problems.

loans.use: to buy products for her store

loans.name: Jameel

texts.en:
Jameel is a 55-year-old married man and the father of nine children, for whom he seeks to provide the best life possible. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen.

Jameel was expatriated and now works hard to offer a good life for his family. He has a house and he intends to complete the construction of his building. So, he applied for a loan of 500,000 Yemen rials (YER) from AMB to buy painting materials and cement for his building.

loans.use: to buy painting materials and cement for his building.

loans.name: George

texts.en: George is 42 years old and lives in Kagadi, Uganda, where he has earned a living for the last 10 years by selling produce.
